name: ARCitect
description: Tool to edit Annotated Research Contexts (ARCs).

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.compilew: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.cjs --win
scripts.compilem: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.cjs --mac
scripts.publish:win: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.cjs --publish always
scripts.publish:mac: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --universal --config electron-builder.config.cjs --publish always
scripts.publish:lnx: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.cjs --publish always
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:preload && npm run typecheck:renderer
